desc:
1.	Maintenance and Divorce Orders were uploaded by the agents over the weekend of the 30th and 31st.
2.	The work disappeared out of the agentsâ€™ folders on manual sorting so the assumption is that the auto sorter sorted the images and moved them to the folder structure.
3.	When Cobus sent his report on Monday morning, the report was almost identical to the Friday report which leads us to believe that there may be an issue with the auto sorter.
4.	The agents that uploaded over the weekend are, H Amod, B Olivier, and J Wiggill.
5.	Another concern is that we have seen that there are a lot of images sitting in the manual sorting section under the agents where the barcodes look like they always have, i.e. good quality and the correct way up, but the images are not being sorted. We are not sure if these two issues are related. This seems to have been happening since the new auto sorter around the 18th of May.
name: CW - CCW321 - Auto Sorter
